name: Dead On Time
description:
Try to identify which party guest arrived first, then shoot them (trust us, they're really bad news). You only get one bullet.

A little thing made in a week for the 2020 7 Day FPS Jam and Procjam. 

Mouse/WASD to move around

Right mouse button to toggle between schmooze mode / gun mode.

Left mouse button to talk (schmooze mode) or shoot (gun mode).

TAB key or middle mouse button: Toggle your magnetic noteboard. New feature! The game now includes a magnetic noteboard with a little magnet for each guest. You can arrange them however you want. There's no mechanics or scoring involved, it's just a little tool to help you organize things visually. Click and hold the left mouse button to drag a magnet around.

1.1 Update: Fixed some dialog issues, added a credits screen.

1.2 Update: Can now click past dialogue, added the magnetic noteboard.

HANDY HINTS

  • the guests always tell the truth (even the villain!)
  • the villain always arrives before the first party event
  • supper is always the last event
  • remember, you don't need to figure out the order in which all the guests arrived, just who got there first
  • keeping extra notes on pen and paper is a lot easier than juggling it all in your head.
